attributes.action: “UK SCIENCE TO TEACH DINOSAURS LIVED ON EARTH ONLY THOUSANDS OF YEARS AGO”
attributes.additional_details:
Please note that the 30,000 year old approximate dates are based on assumptions regarding base datum of carbon-14.
It is considered that these dates should actually be much lower if full account were taken of the fact that the earth had a global catastrophic flood approximately 4,500 years ago.
However, for more details of the findings as they are currently understood please see attached link from the website of the Institute of Creation Research:
http://newgeology.us/presentation48.html
attributes.background: In recent years, a number of radiometric dating tests have indicated the presence of Carbon- l4 within dinosaur bones. These tests have indicated that the dinosaur bones are approximately 30,000 years old.
